name: Avocado Toast
description: Toasted sourdough topped with smashed avocado and cherry tomatoes.
fullDescription: A perfect start to your day with crispy sourdough toast topped with creamy smashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, a sprinkle of chili flakes, and a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Berry Parfait
description: Layers of yogurt, granola, and fresh berries.
fullDescription: Greek yogurt layered with crunchy granola and a medley of fresh seasonal berries, lightly sweetened with honey.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
description: Grilled chicken, romaine, parmesan, and Caesar dressing.
fullDescription: A hearty wrap stuffed with grilled chicken, crisp romaine lettuce, shaved parmesan, and classic Caesar dressing.

name: Quinoa Bowl
description: Protein-rich quinoa with roasted veggies and tahini.
fullDescription: Nutty quinoa paired with roasted seasonal vegetables, chickpeas, and a lemon-tahini drizzle.

name: Spaghetti Pomodoro
fullDescription: Al dente spaghetti tossed in a vibrant tomato-basil sauce, finished with extra virgin olive oil and parmesan.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Salmon fillet with lemon herb butter.
fullDescription: Perfectly grilled salmon topped with lemon herb butter, served with seasonal vegetables.

name: Veggie Tacos
description: Corn tortillas with spiced veggies and salsa.
fullDescription: Warm corn tortillas filled with spiced roasted vegetables, pico de gallo, and a touch of crema.

name: Trail Mix Bites
fullDescription: Bite-sized energy snacks made with oats, nuts, seeds, and a hint of maple syrup.

name: Sweet Potato Fries
fullDescription: Hand-cut sweet potato fries, served hot with a garlic-lime aioli.

name: Iced Matcha Latte
fullDescription: Premium matcha whisked with milk and poured over ice for a refreshing pick-me-up.

name: Citrus Spritz
fullDescription: A bubbly blend of grapefruit, lemon, and soda with a sprig of mint.

name: Chocolate Brownie
fullDescription: Rich chocolate brownie with crunchy walnuts and a crackly top.
